attributes.action: Implement a policy whereby pensioners receive free dental treatment
attributes.additional_details: I have had 6 years of my expected state pension taken away by the government, as have thousands of others, and during the last 10 years have not visited a dentist as I cannot afford to!
attributes.background: All pensioners should be eligible for FREE dental treatment.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
